TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_planks
inventory=[{"type": "mooshroom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 16}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 48, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 29, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 32}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 26, "index": 35}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft crimson_planks, I need to place 1 crimson_hyphae in the crafting table. I will move the crimson_hyphae from slot 24 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_planks
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "mooshroom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 16}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 48, "index": 23}, {"type": "pink_dye", "quantity": 29, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 3, "index": 32}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 26, "index": 35}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "smithing_table", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}]
thought: I have crafted 4 crimson_planks and they are in the crafting output slot (0). I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
